APPENDIX E
DEMONSTRATION KITS SELECTED FOR
THE MATERIALS LIBRARY
Kit K-101 "Utilization of the Creative Art Radio Series,
Let’s DraW
PRODUCED BY:
The Wisconsin School of the Air
DESCRIPTION:
The kit will contain two items: a fifteen
minute tape recording giving background on the
Wisconsin School of the Air, the Let's Draw
series, and Information on using the lesson;
and a second Item, a thirty minute color film
showing the entire utilization process from
preparation to displaying the finished pictures.
AUDIENCE:
o o o Classroom teachers without special
training In the use of radio.
, . . o Teacher In-service classes.
. . o Education pre-service classes„
o . . General teacher meetings.
DESCRIPTION OF BASIC PROGRAM:
The selected radio broadcast will illustrate
the Introduction of a new medium, probably chalk
or water color. In addition to the presentation
of simple techniques, there will be motivation
for the subject of drawing for the broadcast,
development of ideas within the classroom and
other pertinent utilization procedures including
post-broadcast utilization. Photographs would be
used to point up the various techniques.
